snippet: The songs from "Ghost Brothers of Darkland County," a musical by Stephen King and John Mellencamp, will be released on an album in the spring.
abstract: The songs from "Ghost Brothers of Darkland County," a musical by Stephen King and John Mellencamp, will be released on an album in the spring.

headline.main: King and Mellencamp's Musical Comes Back to Life
headline.print_headline: King-Mellencamp Musical Comes Back to Life
